metadata.keywords: device, game, controller, ps5, xbox, run

sections.title: PlayStation 5 Dual Sense Controller
sections.text: The Dual Sense Controller is a remarkable bit of kit. The PS5 Controller supports playing a Core Haptic file straight out of the box. Use the Export Menu in Haptrix to export a stub to help get you started

sections.title: Xbox Series X Controller
sections.text: The Xbox Series X Controller also supports Core Haptics, I would say it's not as accurate as the PS5 Controller.
